home_support_dialog_content:
Thanks for using the app and making the effort to choose cruelty-free! 💖️
️
We are very happy to help make that choice easier for you, but there is one little thing we ask you to keep in mind.

We are a very small team of 3: a data manager, a designer, and an app developer. 

Furthermore, we are working on this app only in our free time, and we’re trying our best to keep the information up to date, communicate with the brands, get the official permissions from the organizations to show their data, and fix bugs! 

The app is and will be completely free and doesn't contain any ads or affiliate links.

We are sorry if the brand you are looking for is missing from our lists, or you encounter any problems while using the app. 

Please feel free to reach out to us about any concerns via bunnysearchmobileapp@gmail.com, and we will be happy to help!

Stay tuned for the updates, and thank you for choosing cruelty-free 🐰
brand_details_peta_dont_test_marker: Is in PETA Don't Test list
brand_details_peta_do_test_marker: Is in PETA Do Test list
brand_details_bunny_search_marker: Approved by the Bunny Search team
